snippet: Former Barcelona club president Jose Nunez has lost his final appeal against a court verdict that sentenced him to two years and two months in prison after being found guilty of bribing tax inspectors.
abstract: Dynamo Moscow and FC Salzburg each record victories that send them into the next round of the Europa League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Former Barcelona club president Jose Nunez has lost his final appeal against a court verdict that sentenced him to two years and two months in prison after being found guilty of bribing tax inspectors.
